<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs=""
>
[Stalk Goggles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1821)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 80

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn eyepiece

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These black leather goggle frames have no lenses. Instead, when a character puts them on and invests them, the wearer's eyes transform and lengthen into snail-like eyestalks. The wobbly eyestalks stretch out through the lens holes and up over the wearer's head on lengthened optic nerves.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** By focusing hard, you can watch for enemies in all directions. You gain [all-around vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=1) for 1 minute; during this time, you can't be flanked.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
